videos.title: React JS - React Tutorial for Beginners
videos.description: Get up & running with React JS: the most popular JavaScript library in the world!

videos.title: React Course - Beginner's Tutorial for React JavaScript Library [2022]
videos.description: Learn React by building eight real-world projects and solving 140+ coding challenges.

videos.title: How to Build a React Component with TypeScript Interfaces
videos.description: This guide walks through how to build React components that utilize TypeScript interfaces. Using TypeScript can help guide the development process and document the rules that the application should follow.

docs.title: Tutorial: Intro to React

docs.title: Getting started with React
docs.description: Learn a bit about how React works by setting up a basic React toolchain on your local computer, and creating and playing with a simple starter app.

docs.title: The JS Concepts You Should Know Before Learning React
docs.description: React is one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks for building single page applications. Thus, a good understanding JS is fundamental in building large scale React applications.

practice.title: React Tutorial
practice.description: Learn modern React from scratch, and practice in an intuitive environment. Throughout this course, you will build an online supermarket shopping app with Stripe integration.

practice.title: Front-end Development Libraries - React
practice.description: In this course, you'll learn how to create different React components, manage data in the form of state props, use different lifecycle methods, and more.
